Texts.Chs: 不同的蜂巢可以提炼出不同的材料，这些就需要你亲自实验了。
Texts.Eng: Different combs contain very different resources. Experimentation is part of the challenge!

Texts.Chs: 在加工台制作一台^orange;木制离心机^reset;，把蜂巢放进去来提取^green;蜂蜡^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Place the combs within a ^orange;Wooden Centrifuge^reset;, which you can build at the Machining Table, and collect the ^green;wax chunks^reset; from within.
